description:
FlexiSpot anniversary sale is here, with a chance to win a free order! Use the code ''Linus50'' for $50 off on E7PRO, E7PLUS standing desk and C7 chair:

FlexiSpot E7 Plus Standing Desk:
US: https://bit.ly/3X9istS

CAN: https://bit.ly/3YPnWen

FlexiSpot C7 ergonomic chair:
US: https://bit.ly/3AtL0pf

CAN: https://bit.ly/4cqwpYM

De-Googling is hard, but Proton, Tresorit, 1Password, Ente, OpenStreetMap, FreeTube, and more want to help you break Google’s monopoly over your digital life. How do they work, and why should you trust them?

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1580105-de-google-your-life-part-2-ad-free-youtube/

Password Managers
- Bitwarden - https://bitwarden.com/
- KeePassXC - https://keepassxc.org/
- 1Password - https://1password.com/
- Proton Pass - https://proton.me/pass

Authenticators
- Ente Auth - https://ente.io/auth/
- Authy - https://authy.com/

Maps
- OpenStreetMap - https://www.openstreetmap.org/
- Magic Earth - https://www.magicearth.com/
- Os
title: De-Google Your Life - Part 2: Ad-Free YouTube!
